body_html:
The last line in the new documentation for tensor attributes (https://pytorch.org/docs/master/tensor_attributes.html) links to torch.sparse (https://pytorch.org/docs/master/sparse.html#sparse-docs) for more information:

For more information on torch.sparse_coo tensors, see torch.sparse.

but I think it hasn't been updated yet, I couldn't find any reference to sparse_coo_tensor in the documentation for torch.sparse.
body_text:
The last line in the new documentation for tensor attributes (https://pytorch.org/docs/master/tensor_attributes.html) links to torch.sparse (https://pytorch.org/docs/master/sparse.html#sparse-docs) for more information:

For more information on torch.sparse_coo tensors, see torch.sparse.

but I think it hasn't been updated yet, I couldn't find any reference to sparse_coo_tensor in the documentation for torch.sparse.
body:
The last line in the new documentation for tensor attributes (https://pytorch.org/docs/master/tensor_attributes.html) links to `torch.sparse` (https://pytorch.org/docs/master/sparse.html#sparse-docs) for more information:

> For more information on torch.sparse_coo tensors, see torch.sparse.

but I think it hasn't been updated yet, I couldn't find any reference to `sparse_coo_tensor` in the documentation for `torch.sparse`.
